text: Vo Vselennoy yest' mnogo ochevidnykh faktov i priznakov, ukazyvayushchikh na mogushchestvo Allakha Vsevyshnego i Yego vlast' nad ney. Allakh yavlyayet vam molniyu, i vy strashites' yeyo vida ili boites' togo, chto posle neyo ne ko vremeni pol'yot sil'nyy dozhd', kotoryy pogubit rasteniya. Ili, uvidev molniyu, naoborot, vy zhdote, chtoby poshol sil'nyy dozhd', nuzhnyy dlya orosheniya rasteniy. Allakh - Tot, kto vyrashchivayet dozhdevyye tuchi
